(A) CREDIT RISK

Credit risk is the risk of loss that may arise on outstanding financial instruments should a counterparty default on its obligations.The Group‘s exposure to credit risk arises primarily from trade and other receivables. For other financial assets (including cash and bank balances and derivatives). the Group minimises credit risk by dealing exclusively with high credit rating counterparties.
